body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo, 2.4G Full-Sized Ergonomic Computer Keyboard with Wrist Rest Support and 1600 DPI Wireless Noiseless Mouse for Windows, PC, Laptop, Windows XP/7/8/10-Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Ergonomic Wireless Keyboard Mouse】 This full-size wireless keyboard designed ergonomically with wrist rest and folding stand to keep it at an optimal slope to prevent your wrists from hurting during long typing sessions. The keyboard is also designed with a non-slip pad, so it stays in place while you type quickly. Note: The USB receiver plugs into the battery compartment of the mouse and can be found by opening the mouse battery cover.

【Plug and Play 2.4G Wireless Connection】 2.4 GHz USB receiver can be connected to both keyboard and mouse, or used separately. Just need to plug and play without any software download required. 2.4 GHz wireless provides a strong and reliable connection up to 33 feet (10 meters) without any latency. Comes with a USB receiver (stored in the back of the mouse)

【Automatic power saving 】This wireless keyboard mouse would enter power saving mode automatically when you stop using the keyboard or mouse for a while. This feature greatly extends the battery life, and you can click any button to wake up the kyboard mouse. The keyboard requires 2 AAA battery and the mouse requires 1 AA battery. (Note: Batteries are NOT Included)

【Wireless Optical Mouse】The mouse is optically designed to get precise control even on some smooth surfaces. 1600 DPI allows you to gain more precise control. Also, This wireless mouse is quiet and comfortable with contoured shape to fit your hands perfectly.

【Universal compatibility and after-sales service】This wireless keyboard and mouse combo is compatible with windows XP//7/8/10/X. It is suitable for desktop, Chrome-book, PC, laptop, computer, etc. we provide 30-day free returning& 12-month waranty. If you have any questions pls feel free to contact us.
body.description: Ergonomic Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo Full Size Keyboard with a Palm Rest help reduce wrist fatigue and make it easier to type for longer periods of time. Wireless optical mouse with countered shape provides smooth and accurate tracking Stable Wireless Connection One USB receiver for both the keyboard and mouse without any need to install additional software, plugin, and play. Working distance up to 10 meters. No more delays. Wide Compatibility Can work with all laptops, desktops, PC, and notebooks with USB ports. Compatible with ALL Windows OS, BUT NOT FULLY SUPPORT with Mac!!!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 146 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ergonomic Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo Full Size Keyboard with a Palm Rest help reduce wrist fatigue and make it easier to type for longer periods of time. Wireless optical mouse with countered shape provides smooth and accurate tracking Stable Wireless Connection One USB receiver for both the keyboard and mouse without any need to install additional software, plugin, and play. Working distance up to 10 meters. No more delays. Wide Compatibility Can work with all laptops, desktops, PC, and notebooks with USB ports. Compatible with ALL Windows OS, BUT NOT FULLY SUPPORT with Mac!!! Specification Keyboard Dimension: 16.5x7.2x1.0 IN Mouse Dimension: 4.33x2.5x1.53 IN Keyboard Battery: 2 * AAA Mouse Battery: 1 * AA Operate System: XP Win7/8/10 (Not fully support with Mac)

Palm Rest and Foldable Stands The keyboard is designed with a palm rest, which helps in alleviating strain, provides sturdy support, and prevents fatigue in long-term use. Foldable stands allow the keyboard to tilt to the most comfortable angle for you. Full-sized and Curve layout The curve layout provides a natural typing position. Full-sized keyboard with fast-access hot keys, versatile function keys, direction keys, and a number pad gives you efficient and easy operation. The design is sleek, compact, and very stylish. Long Battery Life The wireless keyboard is powered by 2 AAA batteries, and the wireless mouse is powered by 1 AA battery (batteries are not included). And the wireless keyboard and mouse will automatically enter sleep mode after a few minutes of inactive to save power.

Deep-dish Keycaps The dished-out key tops help keep your fingertips planted on the keys, which makes typing more comfortable. And the raised ridge on the F and J keys provides the perfect amount of tactile feedback to find the home position. Symmetry Design Wireless Mouse This wireless mouse is a symmetry design, no matter, if you are Right, handed Left-handed, both hands are available, and suitable for all people. Soundless design helps you concentrate on your work. Plug and Play Simply remove the USB receiver from the mouse, plug it into a USB port on your computer, and both the keyboard and mouse are connected to the receiver instantly. 2.4Ghz USB Dongle with a powerful and reliable connection, working distance up to 10 meters. No more delays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly Surprised by This Duo
reviews.reviewText: I've tried a few different wireless mouse and keyboard combos, lately.With one, I loved the rounded keys, but didn't like that there wasn't enough delineation between the areas of the keyboard. Also, the right shift key was cut in half, to make room for the home key. I'd go to type an exclamation point and end up at the beginning of the paragraph, which was very annoying. The mouse was really tall and clunky and it hurt my hand.With the other, I really liked the sleek, low-profile mouse, but the keyboard itself was awful! The keys were too high, too square and too sharp. It was very uncomfortable to type and it seemed like it took more effort, which is not at all what I was looking for. The keyboard was so long, that I didn't really have room for it AND the mouse on my desk pullout. It wasn't stable, either. It slid all over the place, which is fine when you want to move it, but NOT when you need it to stay in one position.With this combo, I feel that I have the best of everything. The mouse is small, flat, sleek, and very responsive. The keyboard is compact, but there is enough delineation between the sections, without the annoying overlap. I can position the keyboard in the middle of the pullout (where I really need it), and still have enough room to move my mouse. The keys are round, giving it a very graceful look and feel.Heads-up: I thought this was missing the nano receiver, because I couldn't find it. But, then I realized that it was tucked into the battery department of the keyboard.I don't know if this comes with an auto-sleep function, where the keyboard and mouse turn off, after a certain number of minutes of inactivity. To save battery, it would be good to get into the habit of manually turning the mouse and keyboard off at night, or whenever you know you'll be away from your computer for a while.I already had a wireless keyboard, from the same maker, so this is an upgrade, for me. Re: the mouse, I'm grateful that I have one less (very long and cumbersome) cord to deal with.I'm very happy with this combo, so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No wasted space
reviews.reviewText: Limited keyboard space? This is everything you need and not too large. It came with a full silicone protective cover (nice surprise). I’m keeping on to keep it clean. This was also the best price value out there!

reviews.reviewText: At first it worked really well for a week but after that mouse and keyboard both stopped working properly, keys also have to press very hard and just seemed didn’t worked well at all.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THIS THING IS GREAT!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Nice, retro look! A nice plastic cover over the keyboard to keep it clean and protected, the wireless dongle works with PlayStation five, and it has open connectivity for two other Bluetooth devices. This is an awesome awesome product!
